YOU MUST READ THIS BEFORE PLAYING THIS GAME


 There is a four digit number made of 4 unique numbers between 1 - 9 you have to guess each one of them in 5 trials 



There are few hints which will help you to guess those numbers 

 
after you enter the four numbers and enter GUESS! button, colour of each number will change 
 
each color has its different meaning 


 GREEN - This means you have guessed the right number and it is in its correct place


RED - This means you have guessed the wrong number and this number is not one of the four numbers


BLUE - This means you have guessed the right number but it is not in its correct place


DETAILED TUTORIAL ON HOW TO PLAY


Suppose you guessed number 1 2 3 4


1 turns Green
 2 and 3 turns Red
 4 turns Blue


This means that 1 is at its right place, leave it as it is
 
2 and 3 turns Red, this means 2 and 3 are not one of the four number
 
4 turns Blue, this means 4 is not in its correct position, it could be at 1st , 2nd or 3rd position

 Then you can try to guess the number again, you have 1 at its right position, you can try to change the position of 4 and replace 2 and 3 with some other number like 5 and 6

 Suppose you guessed number 1 5 4 6 


 1 and 4 turnsGreen 5 and 6 turnsBlue


This means you are near to victory, 5 and 6 are at their wrong position, just change their position and you are done 


 Supposed you guessed number 1 6 4 5


and all of them turns Green 

Congratualtions , You have cracked the code




MODES OF PLAY

 EASY - You will have 5 chances to guess the right number

 MEDIUM - You will have 4 chances to guess the right number

 HARD - You will have 3 chances to guess the right number
